Package p4_group_8_repo.controller

Class SceneController

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.controller.SceneController
public class SceneController
extends Object
A controller that acts as the main controller that handles all other controllers that existed within this project.
Author:
Liew Yih Seng

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SceneController​(javafx.scene.Scene scene)
    A constructor that handles all the assignments of controllers to their respective FXML pages then prepare them to be ready for activation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activate​(String name)
    This method will set this Pane to a new Pane that has been initialized within this class.
    protected void addScene​(String name, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
    This method links a Pane up with a string in the form of key value concept hash map.
    protected void refreshGame()
    This method will replace the existing Game Scene with a new Game Scene where users are able to restart the game play.
    protected void removeScene​(String name)
    This method removes a Pane off the screenMap in this class.
    protected void resetGame()
    This method will replace the existing Game Scene with a new Game Scene where users will immediately be redirected to a new Game Scene with their scores set to 0 and level being set to 1.
    protected void resumeGame()
    This method allows users to resume their game when they paused the game play by clicking onto the resume button on the Pause Scene.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • SceneController

      public SceneController​(javafx.scene.Scene scene) throws IOException
      A constructor that handles all the assignments of controllers to their respective FXML pages then prepare them to be ready for activation. Besides, it will also handle the linking of the key value pair of the Pane to their respective names.
      Parameters:
      scene - A Scene that represents the place to hold these panes.
      Throws:
      IOException - It the IO Operation fails.

  • Method Details

    • addScene

      protected void addScene​(String name, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
      This method links a Pane up with a string in the form of key value concept hash map.
      Parameters:
      name - A string that represents the name of the root to be added into the hash map.
      pane - A Pane that represents the Pane to be linked with the name.

    • removeScene

      protected void removeScene​(String name)
      This method removes a Pane off the screenMap in this class.
      Parameters:
      name - A string that represents the name of the Pane to be removed.

    • activate

      public void activate​(String name)
      This method will set this Pane to a new Pane that has been initialized within this class.
      Parameters:
      name - A string that represents the name of the Pane.

    • resumeGame

      protected void resumeGame()
      This method allows users to resume their game when they paused the game play by clicking onto the resume button on the Pause Scene. It will invoke method World.start() and GameScene.start() then the method activate(String) to activate the GameScene.

    • resetGame

      protected void resetGame()
      This method will replace the existing Game Scene with a new Game Scene where users will immediately be redirected to a new Game Scene with their scores set to 0 and level being set to 1.

    • refreshGame

      protected void refreshGame()
      This method will replace the existing Game Scene with a new Game Scene where users are able to restart the game play.
